content: crochet this stunning hues jumbo puff cowl using three different shades of hue + me yarn bulky level 5 yarn i used the colorways arrowwood agave and fatigues the giant puff stitches provide beautiful texture and work up very quickly you will love being enveloped in luscious puff stitches as this cowl loops twice around the neck the free pattern can be found ** here 1 ** note that the pdf contains five patterns puff scarf puff cowl child puff cowl the jumbo puff cowl and the hues jumbo puff cowl which uses level 5 bulky yarn 1 https //www allaboutami com/hues-jumbo-puff-stitch-cowl/
